title: Boku to Majo no Jikan
sinopse: It was supposed to be a lucky day for Tsuzuri Enji, a fortune-telling loving high-schooler. With hopes of running into a girl on his way to school, he gets hit by a truck and dies. But then one week later he wakes up. How did he survive? And just who is this weird girl? A news series about a boy and a witch.
